sources.title: The Square Jungle (1955)
sources.description: Grocery clerk Eddie Quaid, in danger of losing his father to alcoholism and his girl Julie through lack of career prospects, goes into boxing. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-square-jungle-1955/

metadata.Plot: Grocery clerk Eddie Quaid, in danger of losing his father to alcoholism and his girl Julie through lack of career prospects, goes into boxing. His cop friend McBride finances him; ex-con Bernie Browne trains him. Three years later, he is a challenger for the championship, and Julie re-enters his life. Can she win him back from a predatory blonde? And why does the prospect of Eddie's winning worry Bernie more than his losing?
metadata.Actors: Tony Curtis, Pat Crowley, Ernest Borgnine
